name: Samurott
description: One swing of the sword incorporated in its armor can fell an opponent. A simple glare from one of them quiets everybody.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its water-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
abilities.description: Ups WATER moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.effect: Moves cannot score critical hits against this Pokémon.  This ability functions identically to battle armor.
